name: Work Sib
description:
Join our new human resources hire as she creates a safe space at work in this short narrative RPG. Empower your coworkers to speak up for themselves and encourage education on microaggressions in the workplace.

This game was made for the Safe Spaces Now game jam, organized by Code Coven and UN Women.

Credits:

  • Fizziberry: Lead Artist, Character Designer
  • Niborious: Co-Lead Programmer
  • Max Herzfeld (Wolfmax): Voice Actor (Jacob Wellington), Producer
  • CharCharChar: Lead Script Writer, Voice Actor (Max Leon)
  • Christa Rew: Voice Actor (Nia Jones)
  • Katie Rupinski: Sound Designer
  • Jamie Carolan: Composer
  • BunnyChop: Game Designer/Co-Lead Programmer
